definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: I have also asked some people to help me with opening and closing the church and the gates for parking.
sentences.chinese: 我已經委託了一些教友幫忙打點聖堂和泊車閘門開關。

sentences.english: As an additional function, "Park Assist" offers multiple-move parking into smaller spaces.
sentences.chinese: 作爲附加功能，泊車輔助提供多種動作泊入更小空間。

sentences.english: Any illegally parked vehicles would be towed away.
sentences.chinese: 所有非法泊車的車輛將被拖走。

sentences.english: Residents are blocked in their own driveways by parked cars.
sentences.chinese: 居民被泊車擋住自己的車道。

sentences.english: New parking line were drawn on both sides of the street to solve the parking problem.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解決泊車難的問題，街道兩旁都新設置了停車線。

sentences.english: Set up a "Valet Parking" sign in front of the store.
sentences.chinese: 店門前，放一塊標誌牌“代客泊車”。

sentences.english: It's nice if you can park well.
sentences.chinese: 任何人可泊車，如果你能停好是體面的。

sentences.english: No parking space in the Bethanie, but you may find some car parks nearby, no guarantees though.
sentences.chinese: 泊車位置只供校內人士使用，可尋找附近停車場地。

sentences.english: Assist in valet parking when not assigned any duty.
sentences.chinese: 在沒有工作任務時協助代客泊車。

sentences.english: I am a woman who cannot park a self-parking car.
sentences.chinese: 我是個連有自動泊車系統的車都不會停的女人。

sentences.english: Present staff card together with the parking ticket at Shroff Office or Customer Care Centers.
sentences.chinese: 於停車場繳費處或顧客服務中心出示職員證及泊車卡。

definition: parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to add to existing facilities or services
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
